text: Is this the end of The X - Files? And if so, who ’ s really dead? And who ’ s not? What ’ s the story with that pregnancy shock? Below The X - Files creator Chris Carter takes our burning questions about the season 11 finale in the wake of speculation about the show ’ s future and star Gillian Anderson ’ s declaration that she ’ s finished playing Dana Scully. WARNING : Spoilers ahead! ENTERTAINMENT WEEKLY : Okay, first : Walter Skinner. Just seeing his limp foot isn ’ t very conclusive — at least, in terms of TV rules. So are we to assume he might not really be dead? CHRIS CARTER : It certainly begs many questions. If you pay close attention to that sequence,
